LanguageData.AS_WHE_MaidWare.label: Maid Outfit (Half Elf)
LanguageData.AS_WHE_MaidWare.description: Light and durable maid outfit. The long skirt has a loose and chic design. When equipped, your movement speed and work speed will increase slightly due to your pride as a maid.
LanguageData.AS_WHE_Tribal.label: One piece of cloth (half-elves)
LanguageData.AS_WHE_Tribal.description: Clothing made with primitive tools. Although it is small, it has a heat insulating effect.
LanguageData.AS_WHE_TShirts.label: T-shirt (half elf)
LanguageData.AS_WHE_TShirts.description: A simple T-shirt. The fabric is thin and not very protective. There is no see-through function even if it gets wet in the rain.
LanguageData.AS_WHE_ShortPants.label: Short Pants (Half Elf)
LanguageData.AS_WHE_ShortPants.description: Simple shorts. It has a nice design with less fabric and appeals to what you see, but the defense is low.
LanguageData.AS_WHE_ShirtButton.label: Button Shirt (Half Elf)
LanguageData.AS_WHE_ShirtButton.description: Fashionable shirt and skirt with buttons. The chic design enhances the cuteness of the wearer.
LanguageData.AS_WHE_TankTop.label: Tank Top (Half Elf)
LanguageData.AS_WHE_TankTop.description: Easy-to-move-in tank top and bottoms. Because it is durable, it is suitable for field work. The attached chest ornament is one point.
